description:
Likes film production, and is rumored to video record female students at school as well as having a big hentai collection, thus "earning" the nickname "Erosaki".
After meeting Asami for the first time, in the school library, he immediately takes an interest in her. Mainly as the female candidate for his film, but there is also some feelings.
Lives at the Iwasaki Kitchen.
name: Iwasaki Kouhei
